name: UFO Hoop Master 3D
description: Redefine your tap game experience and prepare for awesome hoop action in true 3D! Control funny UFO using jetpack based physics to swish as many hoops as possible! UFO Hoop Master perhaps the best game to kill free time and enjoy fun mix of classic hoop game and relaxing arcade gameplay. Compete with others players on the leaderboard, and if you're good enough you'll become the champion.
